117
Feby 17th 5
Sergt J. R. Ward
Frankfort. Ky
Sergt.
Yours of the 14th inst: is at hand.
The Governor thinks it is inexpedient to grant your request. You can take four men however and be granted the privilege of going on recruiting service, but no more.

Very Respectfully
D, W, Lindsey
Insp & Adjt Gen Ky
